summary: Provides a high-level wrapper around the Solr search engine used by Open Library, handling query construction, optional expansion via an external Petabox service, execution of HTTP requests, parsing of XML/JSON responses, and exposing utilities for facet aggregation and identifier conversion.
business_intent: Enable the application to perform efficient, feature-rich searches against Solr, including advanced query processing, facet statistics, and mapping between archive identifiers and internal IDs, thereby supporting the libraryâ€™s catalog search functionality.
